page.title: 06HOUSING.
page.content: This is an area well known for its {agriculture.}It should come as no suprise to learn that the majority of houses in the area are{farm houses. The two villages of Rhyd Y Meudwy and Pentrecelyn are small hamlets which follow the roads running through them.There are{no council houses}at Pentrecelyn and only four at Rhyd Y Meudwy. The majority of houses at Pentrecelyn are{not very old.}In fact, most were built this century. The farm houses, on the other hand,are far older. The majority {having thick stone walls.}The traditional families of the district still live on the farms. A number of the farm houses are being{modernised}at present.
